contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Schin op Geul |image_map = LocatieSchinOpGeul.png |subdivision_type = [[List of sovereign states|Country]] |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = Limburg |subdivision_type2 = Municipality |subdivision_name2 = Valkenburg aan de Geul |population = 1680 |population_as_of = 1 January 2006 |coordinates = {{Coor dms|50|51|18|N|5|52|16|E|type:city_zoom:14_region:NL||NB|OL}} |blank_name_sec1 = Transport |blank1_name_sec1 = Major roads |blank1_info_sec1 = [[Provinciale weg 595|N595]] |dialling_code = 043 |postal_code = 6305 |image = [[File:SchinopGeulKerk-002.jpg|250px|Kerk]]<br /> RK St.-Mauritiuskerk }} '''Schin op Geul''' ([[Limburgish]]: ''Sjin'') is a village in the [[Netherlands|Dutch]] province of [[Limburg (Netherlands)|Limburg]]. It is located in the municipality of [[Valkenburg aan de Geul]], about 3 km southeast of the town of Valkenburg.<ref name='ANWB'>''ANWB Topografische Atlas Nederland'', Topografische Dienst and ANWB, 2005.</ref> Schin op Geul was a separate municipality until 1940, when it was merged with Valkenburg.<ref>{{Repertorium Nederlandse Gemeenten}}</ref> Schin op Geul has one train [[Schin op Geul railway station|Station]] served by [[Veolia Transport Nederland|Veolia]] ==References== <references/> ==External links== *{{Kuyper|Schin op Geul|li|schinopgeul}} Map of the former municipality, around 1868. {{Coord|50|51|N|5|53|E|region:NL_type:city_source:GNS-enwiki|display=title}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Schin Op Geul}} [[Category:Populated places in Limburg (Netherlands)]] [[Category:Former municipalities of Limburg (Netherlands)]] {{LimburgNL-geo-stub}}
